DOC.brief_summary: Current guideline-based criteria defining COPD do not meet the challenges set by the complex pathophysiology of the disease. The investigators therefore aimed to evaluate novel or not widely used diagnostic approaches for the detection and therapeutic monitoring of COPD.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Novel Lung Function Parameters in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
DOC.criteria: known or suspected COPD known or suspected obstructive ventilation disorder pulmonary healthy controls pregnancy inability to participate
